text.*:
This is a list of cult video games.

Contents

  • 1 1970s–1980s
  • 2 1990s
  • 3 2000s
  • 4 2010s
  • 5 References

1979
  • Star Raiders[1]
1981
  • Castle Wolfenstein[2]
  • Wizardry[3]
1984
  • Boulder Dash[4]
1986
  • Kid Icarus[5]
1987
  • Phantasy Star[6]
1988
  • Bionic Commando[7]
  • Snatcher[8]
1989

  • Mother[10]
  • River City Ransom[11]
  • Strider[12]
  • Sweet Home[13]

  • Planescape: Torment[52]

2000s[edit]

2000

  • Dark Cloud[21]
  • Deus Ex[59][60]
  • The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask[61][62]
  • Sin and Punishment[19]
  • Skies of Arcadia[54]
  • Valkyrie Profile[54]
2001
  • Conker's Bad Fur Day[19][20][63]
  • Fatal Frame[20]
  • Gitaroo Man[64]
  • Ico[6][22][54][65][66]
  • Rez[67]
  • Shenmue II[21]
  • Zone of the Enders[68]
2002
  • Eternal Darkness: Sanity's Requiem[21][22]
  • The Getaway[69]
  • Ikaruga[70]
  • Metroid Prime[19]
  • Shantae[71]
  • Steel Battalion[72]
2003

2004

  • Vampire: The Masquerade – Bloodlines[80]

  • Fire Emblem: Path of Radiance[83]
  • Haunting Ground[84]
  • Jade Empire[85]
  • Killer7[20][86][87][88]

  • Psychonauts[21][89][90][91][92][93]
2006
  • God Hand[10][94]
  • Ōkami[10][21][54][95]
  • Prey[96]
  • Rule of Rose[76]
2007

  • Odin Sphere[97]

  • The Witcher[99]

Off[107]

2009
  • Bayonetta[96]

2010s[edit]

2010

  • Alpha Protocol[117]
  • Amnesia: The Dark Descent[118]
  • Castlevania: Harmony of Despair[40]
  • Cow Clicker[40]
  • Deadliest Warrior: The Game[40]
  • Deadly Premonition[40][42][96][119][120][121]
  • Enslaved: Odyssey to the West[122]
  • Limbo[123]
  • Nier[40][96][124][125]
  • Protect Me Knight[40]
  • Resonance of Fate[40]
  • Splatterhouse[40]
  • Vanquish[96][126]
  • Xenoblade Chronicles[96][127]
2011
  • Catherine[19][96][128][129]
  • Shadows of the Damned[96]
2012
  • Spec Ops: The Line[130][131][132]
  • Hotline Miami[133][134]
  • Ib[135]
  • Lollipop Chainsaw[136]
2013
  • Gravity Rush[137]
  • The Stanley Parable[138]
2014
  • D4: Dark Dreams Don't Die[19]
  • Five Nights At Freddy’s[139][140][141][142]
2015
  • Life Is Strange[19]
  • Undertale[143][144][145][146][147]
2016
  • Zero Time Dilemma[148]
2017
  • Bendy And The Ink Machine[149]
  • Cuphead[150]
  • Doki Doki Literature Club![151][152]
  • Gravity Rush 2[153]
